Description:
Key Deliverables
- You will be creating adequate automation process and implement technical edge in the Airtel Digital Portfolio.
- Responsible for end to end app deliverables, which includes requirement phase, design phase, app release process and customer issues debugging.
- Should posses strong technical skills in functional/Non functional Testing of backend APIs through Automation ,debugging , monitoring and setup and end to end ownership for delivery and quality of the deliverables.
- Proficient in automation & developing test strategies for non-functional aspects of mobile apps
- Continuously improve QA methodology, process and practices
- Should possess strong ownership of the team's deliverables & play role of a good mentor.
- Collaborate with outsourced testing team and ensure proper planning & execution of manual & automation tests.Skills Required
• Experience in designing automation framework using any language to target backend APIs
• Expertise in object-oriented programming languages and coding skills in any language preferably Java/Python/JS
• Strong knowledge of Rest APIs. Rest Assured with Java preferred
Should be able to debug backend/front-end issues.
Good knowledge of CI/CD Pipeline and Monitoring tools like Jenkins, Kibana, Grafana.
Exposure to Code Coverage analysis tool like Sonarqube, Jacoco is preferred.
Good knowledge of Performance Testing tool.
• Strong knowledge of Mobile Operating Systems and experience in Non Functional testing of Mobile Apps
• Exposure to DevOps and Security Testing is a huge plus.
• Good knowledge of SQL or any NoSql DBMS worked upon like MongoDB, AeroSpike.Educational Qualifications
Bachelor's degree in computer science, Computers Engineering or comparable experienceWork Experience
2-6+ years of hands on experience in software development. (edited basis level of hire)Job Details
